oak_stake.name: Oak Stake
oak_stake.description: According to folklore, it slays vampires when driven into their hearts.

whip_vk0.name: Vampire Killer
whip_vk0.description: Belmont family whip. Its powers have been cursed by Dracula.

whip_vk1.name: Vampire Killer
whip_vk1.description: The legendary whip wielded by the Belmont family.

whip_vk2.name: Vampire Killer
whip_vk2.description: Legendary whip of the Belmonts. Its potential has been fully realized.

whip_leather.name: Leather Whip
whip_leather.description: Made from leather. A weapon for a warrior with panache.

whip_thorn.name: Whip of Thorns
whip_thorn.description: Whip woven of leather and thorns.

whip_steel.name: Steel Whip
whip_steel.description: Whip fashioned from chains of steel.

whip_rose.name: Rose Stem Whip
whip_rose.description: Thorned whip that requires great skill to use.

whip_stone.name: Medusa Whip
whip_stone.description: Whip that can turn its targets to stone.

whip_nebula.name: Nebula
whip_nebula.description: Chain that binds and destroys evil.

whip_fire.name: Flame Whip
whip_fire.description: Whip imbued with the power of flames.

whip_dark.name: Jet Black Whip
whip_dark.description: Jet black whip imbued with the power of darkness.

whip_morningstar.name: Morningstar
whip_morningstar.description: Whip with a vicious, star-shaped head.

whip_undead.name: Undead Whip
whip_undead.description: Holy whip that can kill even the undead.

sword_fragarach.name: Fragarach
sword_fragarach.description: Demonic sword in the shape of a cross.

sword_mystletain.name: Mystletain
sword_mystletain.description: Sword hewn from the wood of a divine tree.

sword_fire0.name: Laevatain
sword_fire0.description: Intensely hot sword that scorches everything it touches.

sword_stone.name: Milican's Sword
sword_stone.description: Sword that sometimes turns those it strikes to stone.

sword_ice.name: Rahab's Frost
sword_ice.description: Icy blade made from the fang of the water-dragon Rahab.

sword_fire1.name: Agni's Flame
sword_fire1.description: Flaming blade of Agni, the god of fire.

sword_heaven.name: Heaven's Sword
sword_heaven.description: Demon-slaying sword once wielded by an angel.

sword_burtgang.name: Burtgang
sword_burtgang.description: Sword blessed with divinity. It is designed for defense first.

sword_bakatwa.name: Bakatwa
sword_bakatwa.description: Simple, effective sword that is easy to wield.

sword_stellar.name: Stellar Sword
sword_stellar.description: Family heirloom of the Kischine bloodline.

sword_damascus.name: Damascus Sword
sword_damascus.description: Superior sword that never loses its razor-sharp edge.

stab_rapier.name: Rapier
stab_rapier.description: Thrusting sword with a tapered blade.

stab_estoc.name: Estoc
stab_estoc.description: Blade primarily designed as a stabbing weapon.

stab_garian.name: Garian Sword
stab_garian.description: Flexible, articulated sword made for executions.

great_falchion.name: Falchion
great_falchion.description: Norman sword with a wide, crescent-shaped blade.

great_great.name: Great Sword
great_great.description: Massive sword designed to smash through its targets.

great_durandal.name: Durandal
great_durandal.description: Sword of giants that was tempered by fairies.

great_ascalon.name: Ascalon
great_ascalon.description: Famous sword of the dragon slayers.

great_balmung.name: Balmung
great_balmung.description: Legendary sword of the dragon slayers.

great_final.name: Final Sword
great_final.description: Blade favoured by the Final Guards.

great_holy.name: Holy Claymore
great_holy.description: Enormous sword shaped like a cross.

great_claimh.name: Claimh Solais
great_claimh.description: Indefatigable sword. Its blade glitters with light.

pole_partisan.name: Partisan
pole_partisan.description: Polearm fitted with a broad blade.

pole_halberd.name: Halberd
pole_halberd.description: Polearm ending in a wide axe blade.

pole_long.name: Long Spear
pole_long.description: Spear with an especially long shaft.

pole_couse.name: Couse
pole_couse.description: Polearm fitted with a large, curved blade.

pole_gungner.name: Gungner
pole_gungner.description: Divine thunderbolt that pierces everything it touches.

cudgel_great.name: Great Axe
cudgel_great.description: Huge war axe. It is exceptionally heavy.

cudgel_mjollnjr.name: Mjollnjr
cudgel_mjollnjr.description: Mighty hammer of the thunder god.

cudgel_gold.name: Golden Axe
cudgel_gold.description: Axe with astounding destructive power, crafted from gold.

katana_blunt.name: Namakura
katana_blunt.description: Blunt sword with a dull cutting edge.

katana_kotetsu.name: Kotetsu
katana_kotetsu.description: Sword named after the legendary swordsmith, Nagasone Kotetsu.

katana_osafune.name: Osafune
katana_osafune.description: Japanese sword with the full name of Bizen Osafune Nagamitsu.

katana_kunitsuna.name: Kunitsuna
katana_kunitsuna.description: Onimaru Kunitsuna, a sword said to have slain Oni demons.

katana_yasutsuna.name: Yasutsuna
katana_yasutsuna.description: Onimaru Kunitsuna, a sword said to have slain Oni demons.

punch_brass.name: Brass Knuckles
punch_brass.description: Metal knuckle weapon that adds sting to your punches.

punch_cestus.name: Cestus
punch_cestus.description: Hard knuckle guards worn by ancient boxers.

punch_bahgnahk.name: Bahg Nahk
punch_bahgnahk.description: Handheld weapon whose name means "tiger claw".

punch_mach.name: Mach Punch
punch_mach.description: Enables the wearer to throw punches at the speed of sound.

punch_illusion.name: Illusion Fist
punch_illusion.description: Throws punches faster than the eye can see.
